<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40d0158c-0850-4354-2d18-827a05cf218f#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Giotto (?): Izsák visszautasítja Ézsaut</string>
            <string language="en">Giotto (?): Isaac refuses Esau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Giotto (?): Isaac lehnt Esau ab</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Giotto (?) : Isaac refuse Esau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Giotto (?): Isaac recusa Esau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giotto (?): Isaac rifiuta Esau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Giotto (?): ο Isaac αρνείται Esau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Giotto (?): Isaac rechaza Esau</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Giotto (?): Izsák visszautasítja Ézsaut, 1290-1295 körül, Assisi, San Francesco, felső templom, hosszház, freskó.</string>
            <string language="en">Giotto (?): Isaac refuses Esau, about 1290-1295 . Assisi, San Francesco, the upper church, nave, fresco.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Assisi,  Izsák,  Ézsau,  13. század,  Assisi Szent Ferenc,  </string>
            <string language="en">Assisi,  Isaac,  Esau,  13th century,  Assisi Saint Francis,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Giotto (?): Isaac lehnt Esau, ungefähr 1290-1295
ab. Assisi, San Francesco, die obere Kirche, Nave, Fresko.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Giotto (?) : Isaac refuse Esau, environ 1290-1295.
Assisi, San Francesco, l'église supérieure, nef, 
fresque.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Giotto (?): Isaac recusa Esau, aproximadamente 
1290-1295. Assisi, San Francesco, a igreja superior, nave, 
fresco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giotto (?): Isaac rifiuta Esau, circa 1290-1295. 
Assisi, San Francesco, la chiesa superiore, nave, fresco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Giotto (?): ο Isaac αρνείται Esau, περίπου 
1290-1295. Assisi, SAN Francesco, η ανώτερη 
εκκλησία, nave, νωπογραφία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Giotto (?): Isaac rechaza Esau, cerca de 1290-1295.
Assisi, San Francesco, la iglesia superior, cubo, fresco.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Assisi, Isaac, Esau, 13. Jahrhundert, Assisi Heiliger Francis,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Assisi, Isaac, Esau, 13ème siècle, Assisi Saint Francis,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Assisi, Isaac, Esau, 1ó século, Assisi Saint Francis,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Assisi, Isaac, Esau, tredicesimo secolo, Assisi San Francis,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Assisi, Isaac, Esau, 13$ος αιώνας, Assisi Αγιος 
Francis,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Assisi, Isaac, Esau, décimotercero siglo, Assisi Santo 
Francis,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

        <rights>

            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:IBCnet Magyarország Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>

              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>

            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet

        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
